sentence: Stepan Company ( SCL ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 29, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.225 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 15, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased SCL prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 9.76% increase over prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $81.88, the dividend yield is 1.1%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SCL was $81.88, representing a -11.93% decrease from the 52 week high of $92.97 and a 19.52% increase over the 52 week low of $68.51.
SCL is a part of the Basic Industries sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
SCL's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $3.86.
Zacks Investment Research reports SCL's forecasted earnings growth in 2017 as 1.06%, compared to an industry average of 13.5%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SCL Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
